question: List pore forming toxins.
ideal_answer:
cytolysin A

pneumolysin
listeriolysin

Staphylococcal bi-component pore-forming toxins, also known as leukocidins,
Streptolysin O (SLO) is a bacterial pore-forming toxin that is employed to permeabilize cell membranes in some biological experiments.
ere we report the structures of a staphylococcal pore-forming cytotoxin, leukocidin
